titleStmt.title: SII 4.546: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 546. (A.R. No. 99 of 1892). ON THE GOPURA OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE, LEFT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī[ḥ.*] pūmaṉṉu patumam pūtta veḻulakun tāmuṉ
ce(tava)tavattāl paritivaḻit(y*)tonṟi neṭumā livaṉenat tiru
muṭi cūṭi Irunilamakaḷai Urimaiyil puṇarn=tu tirumakaḷ paṇaimulaic ceñ
cān=taṇin=tu parumaṇi mārvam paṉivarai nikarppa jayamakaḷ ceḻuntaṇ ca
ndanac cuvaṭṭāl puyamirukaiyilaip poruppeṉattoṉṟi nāmakaḷtāṉum ko
makaṭ cevvāyp pavaḷa ceyoḷi paṭait tanayānenat tavaḷanaṉiṟittaṉittuṭaiyore
na pukaḻmakaṭ ci[ n=taai makuṭa] c cittaneṉa Orukuṭai nilava porupaṭai tikara veyile
karuṅkali Iruḷiṉait turappa niṭu pallūḻi Eḻkaṭaṟ puṟattiluṅ koṭāc cen=tini (ko)
kko linitulāva minamum cilaiyum citain=tu vānuyar pon neṭu meruvil pulivīṟṟi
(i)ruppa Upariyāṉai Or Eṭṭinukku tampamenṉat taṉittani ticaitoṟum vijaya
stampaniṟpa] pacipakaiyā tinitu niṅki mannuyir taḻaippa manuvāṟu viḷaṅka māta
var tavamum maṅkaiyar kaṟpum Ādi An=taṇar Ākutip pukaiyum miteḻukoṇṭal
vicu taṇpunalum metini vaḷaruñ cātiyoḻukkamum nitiyaṟamum piṟaḻātu nikaḻa pāvumpaḻa
nappāvum paṇaikkaimāvum mallatu vaṉṟaṇai ppaṭutal kanaviluṅ kāṇṭaṟkaritena
varunti palveṟpuḷḷilumallatu ciṟai Enappaṭutalinṟi niṟaiperuñcelvame
ā ṭavani vāḻap pallavar teluṅkar māḷavar kaliṅkar koṅkaṇar kannaṭar kaṭārar tennar
ceralar ciṅkaṇar koṅkaṇar cetiyar trikattar vaṅka ra(ra)ṅkar joṉakar kaikayar jinar En
ṟaraikaḻal ven=taru mallā] varaicarum muṟaimaiyi lurin=ta tiṟaikuṇa n=tiṟaiñci Ampo
ṟ kulakkoṭic cempiyankiḻānaṭi yorumarukuṭa na[ man=tiruppa Aruḷpurica maiyap poṟkoṭ ṭi
maiyappāvaiyum civanumpola cempon virasimhāsanattu viṟṟiruntaruḷiya korājake
śaripatmarāna tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīku lottu ṅgacoḷadevaṟkku yāṇṭuThe inscription is incomplete.
Digital edition of SII 4.546 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
